generalInfo:
Get the chance to experience this amazing safari as you explore the world known as the land of a thousand hills, Rwanda’s stunning scenery and warm, friendly people offer unique experiences in one of the most remarkable countries. It is blessed with extraordinary biodiversity, with incredible wildlife living throughout its volcanoes, montane rainforest and sweeping plains. Besides catching a glimpse of the magnificent gorillas, there is so much more to see and experience, Mountain gorilla trekking, birdwatching, classic game drives, nature walks, cultural experiences, and hiking.

Learn of the History of Rwanda from the pre-colonial times to the 1994 genocide.

dayInfo.description: Kigali -Upon arrival at Kigali International Airport, you will be met by our representative, outside the airport arrivals section and after a briefing, transferred to your hotel. Overnight Kigali Serena Meals Breakfast

KIGALI/VOLCANOES NATIONAL PARK After breakfast you will visit the genocide museum and enjoy a city tour of Kigali. After lunch, depart on scenic drive Northwest wards through the beautiful, terraced hillsides that display Rwanda’s landscape. Arrive at Ruhengeri, the base for gorilla trekking at the Parc National des Volcans. The town itself is located only 25km from Uganda boarder, is relatively a small city of about 70,000 people. The constant flow of humanity is quite remarkable. The Town has great views of the surrounding volcanoes. People are very friendly here and although a former Belgian colony (and thus French-speaking), many people speak English here. OVERNIGHT: VIRUNGA LODGE

VOLCANOES NATIONAL PARK – GOLDEN MONKEY TREK Early breakfast. 6.20 AM: Transfer to the Volcanoes National Park headquarters for the golden monkey trek. After the trek, rejoin your driver Guide for a transfer to your lodge for lunch. Afternoon visit the Iby’iwacu cultural Centre, designed to offer many interesting learning activities while at the same time allowing visitors to relax and get a feel of the local culture. Dinner at the lodge. OVERNIGHT: VIRUNGA LODGE Meals (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner)

GORILLA TREKKING Today after an early breakfast you will drive a short distance to the park headquarters for a briefing where you will be assigned a family of gorillas to visit. The trek takes about 2 to 4 hrs. When visiting the ‘Land of a thousand Hills, one should not miss out on the magnificent opportunity to visit Volcanoes National Park consisting of 125 km2 of mountain forest and home to the six Virunga Volcanoes and the world-famous mountain gorillas. Protected within the PNV, the lushly forested slopes of the mountains form an appropriately dramatic natural setting for what is arguably the most poignant and memorable wildlife experience in the world: gorilla trekking. The exhilarating climb to the gorilla’s natural habitat of shady bamboo forest offers fantastic views in all directions, before the trackers are immersed in the mysterious intimacy of the rainforest, alive with the calls of colorful birds and the chattering of rare golden monkey. Nothing can prepare one for the impact of encountering a fully-grown silverback gorilla, up to three times the size of an average man, yet remarkably peaceable and tolerant of human visitors. Please remember to bring your passport for registration, appropriate waterproof hiking boots, and a light raincoat. To protect from stinging nettles, we recommend long pants and long-sleeved tops. A pair of old gardening gloves can help grabbing onto the vegetation while most hotels/lodges provide a walking stick that come in very handy especially when hiking downhill. A small waterproof backpack is an excellent idea to carry a light snack, bottled water as well as protection for your camera. Upon sighting the gorillas, you spend the allowed one hour with them as they go about their daily life; feeding, moving, playing, raising their young and sometimes wrestling with the juveniles – it is a totally unique and unforgettable experience! OVERNIGHT: VIRUNGA LODGE

VOLCANOES/KIGALI/DEPARTURE After a sumptuous breakfast at the hotel, we bid farewell to the staff and the friends we met here, thereafter take a leisurely drive to Kigali, drop off at the Airport for your outbound flight. MEAL PLAN: BREAKFAST
